reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Basics 20 Piece Stainless Steel Flatware Set with Square Edge
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m HIGHLY IMPRESSED with this Amazon Basics Stainless Steel Flatware Set…they are heavy duty & have a High End Look to them (like something you’d see in a High End Restaurant)…I’ve ran them through my dishwasher several times & they come out perfect…other reviewers have made comments about them rusting…I have not had this experience…I’ve even let them lay in water in my sink for a few hours & they did not rust (normally I would not do this…they would normally go straight into the dishwasher)…these have a silky smooth comfortable feel to them…this Amazon Basics Flatware set is a GREAT VALUE…I really enjoy them & I hope you will to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and on budget!
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with the look and quality of this flatware. It’s attractive and a good, heavy weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly expensive feeling for the price.
reviews.reviewText: These are great. For 17 bucks I expected flatware that felt like plastiware. That is not the case.My kids manage to dump the remainder of their plates in the garbage. Somehow, it is just too much trouble to make sure there isn't a knife or a fork still on the plate. Over the last couple of hears we have whittled down my 16 piece setting to about 4 pieces. This was especially irritating as this was a very expensive set.Surprise! You can't tell the difference on these. They feel just as weighty and sturdy in your hand. You can't go wrong w/ these!

reviews.reviewerName: Jeans and T-shirt girlJeans and T-shirt girl
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice every day silverware
reviews.reviewText: I ended up buying 2 sets of these because we liked them so much. My husband didn't care for the ones we already had because they always fell off the plate when he carried it around. This silverware does not. It has a nice weight to it but the handle is not heavy so as to fall off the plate. They are not like the cheap Walmart and Dollar Tree silverware. The forks are not sharp and don't feel like they are going to cut your mouth like some inexpensive silverware does. These go throughthe dishwasher fine.. My only problem with these was when the knives were left in the sink one developed a small rust mark on it but it was easily cleaned with a Mr. Clean scrubber. I would recommend these for every day use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAR Exceeds Expectations !
reviews.reviewText: Unlike many, I have strong opinions about Silverware. I had only 4 place settings of some very nice, high quality, heavyweight Gorham 18/10 Stainless. I love that silverware ! I don't like flimsy, cheap diner type silverware. I bought another set from Macy's (International Silver) and was totally disappointed. Very light, no balance or heft and a pattern that actually dug into your had at the butt end of every piece. I wrapped it up and donated it. I was going to go all in and buy US made Liberty Tabletop (old Oneida brand) for almost $300 for a 12 setting set. I glanced at Amazon Basics 65-Piece Stainless Steel Flatware Silverware Set with Pearled Edge, Service for 12 for 1/5th the price. Now, I want to be patriotic and buy American, but I can't justify leaving $200+ on the table. I bought the Amazon Basics set and could not be more pleased! First off, the pieces are HEAVIER than the Liberty Tabletop pieces. They are big and the pattern (Pearled Edge) is done tastefully and virtually matches the Gorham I have. I know it is 18/0 and not 18/10, so the shine will not be as pronounced, but for dinners in which you are not expecting the Queen of England, these are wonderful. Thanks Amazon, excellent value!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Everyday Elegance: Amazon Basics 20-Piece Stainless Steel Flatware Set
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 20-Piece Stainless Steel Flatware Set with Round Edge, designed to serve 4, has seamlessly blended practicality with a touch of elegance for my everyday dining needs.Using them daily has proven their durability, and the stainless steel construction ensures longevity, maintaining both their form and shine through regular use. The round edge design adds a subtle sophistication, enhancing the overall aesthetic without compromising functionality.While these utensils are serviceable for everyday use, their appearance is versatile enough to complement various table settings. Despite being designed for daily meals, the flatware set brings a subtle sense of refinement to the dining experience.The 20-piece set provides ample utensils for daily family use, and the convenience of not having to reserve them solely for guests adds a practical dimension. They have become a reliable and practical choice for meals, proving that everyday dining can be both functional and aesthetically pleasing.In conclusion, the Amazon Basics Stainless Steel Flatware Set with Round Edge is a solid investment for those seeking both durability and style in their daily dining utensils. If you prefer a set that effortlessly transitions between everyday meals and occasional gatherings without compromising on quality, this flatware set is an excellent choice.
